alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 2:53AM MST until December 13 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Northeast Highlands, Harding County, Eastern San Miguel County, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Curry County, Roosevelt County, and De Baca County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects, including inflatable Christmas decorations. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
